column1: #Gave english localisation for german and spanish language as a placeholder.

column2: Now that you reached adulhood, you have been assigned a spouse, as the Qun demand it
column3: Désormais que vous êtes adulte, une épouse vous à été assigné, comme le Qun l'exige.
column4: Now that you reached adulhood, you have been assigned a spouse, as the Qun demand it
